attributes.action: Legalise the controled sale and use of Cannabis Sativa, Indica, &  Ruderalis.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a petition against the criminalisation of millions of the UK population.  We want decriminisation of cannabis to be to a top priority for the government.  Regulation not prohibition!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
